This is a really fun experience when playing with friends, most of my hours in this game is with friends playing as a survivor and we have a really good time.

Play this game alone and you will not have a good time. Play survivor alone and almost  every game your teammates will wrong you, leave you on hook, sandbag you or just hide in a bush the entire match and be about as useless as dry cum.

Play killer and experience what its like to have 4 nightmare goblins taunt you and tea bag at you through any window you see them. God forbid you launch this game past 6:00pm as you are swarmed with teams of gremlins communicating on coms and stunning you at every pallet which locations they have engraved in their little goblin minds.

This game is fun when you do well, but the matchmaking system is really playing against you if you are solo queuing. 

with friends 9/10,
without friends 5/10

Es un juego bastante completo, costantemente están agregando nuevo contenido. 
El juego, de forma muy resumida consta de 4 supervivientes que tienen que reparar 5 generadores para poder abrir las puertas y así poder escapar del asesino. Este tiene que evitar que los supervivientes reparen los generadores.
Cada superviviente, como asesino, tiene sus propias habilidades y accesorios.
10/10

Dead by Daylight is unrivalled asymmetrical competitive multiplayer game. The premise of the game is to match one terrifying Killer with unique abilities against four unfortunate Survivors. The main task of the Survivors is to repair five generators and then escape through the exit gate (optionally through the hatch). For this purpose, cooperation is important - mutual protection, healing, and also destroying cursed totems. As the Killer, your job is to sacrifice the four Survivors to the Entity.

The graphics, music and sounds of the environment, along with an extensive pool of specific and interesting maps, awesome skins, constant updates & events (fe. Lunar, Halloween, Winter) and a variety of content in the form of over 25 survivors and 25 killers [also licensed ones from your favourite movies, tv series, books & comics - like "The Saw" (Pig), "Hellraiser" (Pinhead), "Resident Evil" (Nemesis), "Silent Hill" (Pyramid Head), "Stranger Things" (Demogorgon), "Halloween" (Michael Myers), "A Nightmare on Elm Street" (Freddy Krueger), "The Texas Chainsaw Massacre" (Leatherface) or "Scream" (Ghostface)] are a definite advantage of the game.

A decisive downside of the game is the hitbox system as well as dedicated servers (main source of lags, broken hits etc.) - some of the received or missed hits can literally break your soul. The ranking system is also unfavorable. Many players are in the wrong place - skilled players are associated with people who literally cannot play and do everything expect the survivor objectives. MMR (SBMM) is a one big joke. When you reach the top level, the game is practically unplayable due to the lack of balance - a well-coordinated team of survivors will almost always win against the killer due to the too short repair time of generators and effective looping by dropping pallets early and using map resources. You have to be prepared that on some maps you will simply fail due to the map size and the technical maladjustment of the killer. Sometimes, as a survivor, you will be proxy camped and tunneled due to which you hardly ever experience any fun in some particular games. The sad fact is that players are not innovative and in practically every match - on both the Survivor and Killer side - use the same meta perks, so you won't experience different build combinations as much as you expect even though each side has access to almost 100 perks - perhaps because developers do not balance the game properly. Game developers rarely add new realms (maps) - what's more, due to their own oversight and bugs, they turn off the existing maps for many weeks (fe. 'Raccoon City Police Station' or 'Dead Dawg Saloon'). Developers DO NOT listen to the voices of the community and DO NOT adopt certain solutions.

Overall, DBD is a good game that has both huge pros and significant cons. Personally, I rate the game at solid 7.5/10 and I hope the game will only get better with time.

I would never recommend this to anyone I respect, love, or like. This game has huge slopes of good games and bad ones. Most of the time, when you play as survivor you'll get tunneled or camped by the killer until you get sacrificed. Oh and there's a really fun mechanic where a killer gets an offering called a Mori where you can insta die and derank as a result of being in the match. 10/10 would recommend

Pretty addicting and satisfying at most times despite its flaws. If you want to play a killer in a game, this is basically the game for you.

EDIT: I also want to bring up the grind for the game. If you are planning to have good perks to use on the characters, plan on sinking a ton of time into the game to level up the characters whom have the perks you want to use. Also, these good perks will come from dlc characters, so prepare to also save up some money to purchase some dlc's too.

Despite the occasional bugs and toxic post game chat, overall a pretty fun game once you get the hang of it.
Once you reach the really high ranks, people tend to be quite nice and sportive, which makes the game more fun ofcourse.

Game is fast paced and fun to play with friends.  Watch some youtube videos to learn how to assign perks to your survivor to get the most out of your game play.  Play as a survivor or killer, both get your heart pounding pretty good!
For the age of this game, it never gets old. If you like classic horror films, this is a must get game.

Esse jogo merece todo meu amor e carinho
Nunca vi algo tão impecável em toda minha vida
Todas as mecânicas do jogo funcionam como deviam, matchmaking, hitbox e cross-play 
O jogo tambám é muito otimizado, possibilitando que ate mesmo aqueles com os computadores mais fracos possam se divertir jogando essa obra primo
É perceptível que a equipe de desenvolvimento se esforça todos os dias para melhorar ainda mais o jogo para que tenhamos uma experiencia melhor a cada dia, e eles não precisam se preocupar com bugs, já que não existem
Sua comunidade não é nem um pouco toxica, sempre respeitando as regras do jogo (não tunelar, não campar de bubba no base, não usar mori, não piscar lanterna, não dar t-bag)
Conclusões finais: Dead By Daylight é um jogo perfeito, excepcional que será muito importante na geração atual e sempre terá espaço nos corações dos jogadores

Bought it back in 2017. At first I was open to the idea that the game would be changed and altered over time. I approached it like I was play-testing the game. But recently, idk what the devs of this game are smoking but they need to go to rehab for it. I seriously question if they play their own game sometimes. The meta in this game is soooo unchecked, for both sides but mostly killer as of right now. It plays more like an e-sports game than a survival horror one.

The official deal breaker for me was when I just entered a match as killer, moved a little bit forward, noticed horrible lag, and immediately left. Nobody was hit or hooked, but I could tell the server connection was trash so I left. 15 MINUTE BAN. REALLY BHVR?? I'm timed out from matchmaking for 15 MINUTES because I can tell I'm going to do horrible at the beginning of a match? Looks like 20GB of memory is about to become available on my PC....

Dead by Daylight's dev team might be more transparent, but they've created a horribly imbalanced game that favors killers who don't like to play interactively. Been going endlessly against garbage killers who camp, slug, and tunnel now that there are no punishments for doing so. Great game, wish I could stop playing but I'm addicted to this garbage

This game is so much with friends! I totally recommend it if you wish to have an awesome and spooky gaming night with your comrades. The licensed killers like Michael Myers and Pyramid Head are the icing on the cake. The guest survivors like Steve Harrington from Stranger Things and Cheryl Mason from silent Hill also adds a lot of fun.

A very tense game when you are a survivor and gleefully brutal when you are a killer.

This games does have some let downs like the matchmaking has to be smoothed over. You will find yourself as a newbie facing off against single digit ranked players. Also, character balance needs to be tweaked between killers and survivors.

However, all together, this game is so much fun and I find myself playing with my friends every Friday night.

I was late to the DbD party, so my views of this game are only based on a year of play, and even in that year there have been multiple changes-some for the better and some for the not so better.  However, there is nothing I can really hate on this game for. Sometimes the matchmaking sucks and you get toxic people, sure. But then then next match you get an amazing group of players. I can't blame the game for how people choose to play it. The 4v1 horror genre is my cup of tea, and I will forever have a soft spot in my heart for this game, the community, and the meme moments <3

Dead by Daylight to świetna gierka! Zdecydowanie najlepsza tego typu gra na rynku. 
Twórcy stale ją rozwijają dodają nową zawartość, co jest warte pochwalenia, bo gra ma już 4 lata na karku. Jest to gra z serii "easy to learn hard to master". Dzięki podzieleniu graczy na rangi nowi lub słabsi gracze mogą mieć radochę, a bardziej doświadczeni lub lepsi gracze mają szansę prawdziwe wyzwanie w miarę zdobywania wyższych rang. Fakt licznych zadań i wyzwań, które zachęcają do poznawania mechaniki gry lepiej oraz próbowania nowych taktyk, sprawia że gra się nie nudzi nawet po kilkuset godzinach spędzonych z tym tytułem. DbD to świetny tytuł na półgodzinną sesję jak i na dłuższe granie. Gra co prawda posiada płatne DLC oraz mikropłatności, aczkolwiek ich zakup nie wpływa nadto na samą rozgrywkę, a sami twórcy też nie próbują ich na siłę wciskać graczom. 
Mam nadzieję, że DbD będzie rozwijane i wspierane jak najdłużej i będzie się cieszyć niesłabnącą popularnością. Ja w Dead by Daylight gram aktualnie dość często i jak najbardziej polecam ten tytuł. Zwłaszcza, że bardzo często pojawia się on na różnego rodzaju promocjach STEAMowych.
